data.title: Great Food & Atmosphere
data.text: What a busy place. They have a unique menu, the owners are there and work very  hard. Its hard to get a seat sometimes they are that busy. Staff is great and its our place to go on a Saturday morning. Check it out you will not be disappointed.

data.title: Very nice place in a very slow city
data.text:
Aroma is pretty much the only coffee shop that's not a big name or franchise type of place, it's very spacious and the staff is super friendly, one of the few places were you could actually see younger people in this retirement area. The view from the window is really cool, there is a fountain outside. Their sandwiches are really good! They are reasonably priced too! 
If you are looking for a spot to meet a friend or a co-worker, this is the spot in Newport News.

owner_response.author: Geri P, Owner at Aromas World - Specialty Coffees & Gourmet Bakery, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to review us! We are so glad that you found us, and hope to see you again soon!!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Sometimes all you want is just a muffin and coffee
data.text: Aromas fit the bill, nearby the Marriott at City Center. Stopped for a quick cup, muffins looked great. Both were very good, actually the muffin was great. Staff was friendly and helpful even though it was close to closing time. Will stop back to try additional fare.

owner_response.author: Geri P, Owner at Aromas World - Specialty Coffees & Gourmet Bakery, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks! We are super proud of our delicious "secret" recipe muffins.....worked hard to perfect them, and are thrille d that you noticed! Hope you get a chance to try our varying flavors!!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Coffee
data.text: Nice atmosphere and great lattes....staff is friendly and courteous. Just across the street from the Marriott makes for a good match.

data.title: Excellent mocha
data.text: The mocha was so good I had to come back for another.  Great location and friendly staff.  My friends who had a meal there said the food was great.

data.title: Great Coffee
data.text: Very cute place, friendly staff. The smell inside is amazing and our drinks tasted great. The barista even went outside to refill the water bowl for our dogs. 👍🏼

owner_response.author: Geri P, Owner at Aromas World - Specialty Coffees & Gourmet Bakery, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are so glad that you enjoyed stopping at Aromas! Thanks for writing the review, and I'm happy that the coffee was good, and that the staff took care of your pooch. Hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Late Lunch on the Go
data.text: The first impression is great when you walk in, but when the  girl behind the counter is absolutely rude to you, you think about going elsewhere. She was arrogant and bothered to have to talk to you. This was at 4.40 on  Thursday, 7/15/2016, a blondish long hair young girl. I ordered a BLT to go. I asked if anything comes with the sandwich, she said chips. The sandwich was great loaded with bacon.The Doritos chips were very stale. I was expecting potato chips. I threw away the chips and enjoyed the sandwich. I have been here several times for business meetings and friends and wish this experience had been as good, but the service was terrible. FYI,the picture I posted has a girl up front, but she is not the girl that waited on me. You can see the rude server to the right side ,near the back.

data.title: Good
data.text: Is a nice place to eat. They have sandwiches, wraps, salads. Friendly staff, if you are not hungry but still want a sandwich ask for half to go and half to eat there.

data.title: Great Breakfast and Coffee and Tea
data.text:
This place has a cool European feel to it. Enjoy many varieties of tea, biscuits, plenty of breakfast options. We enjoy sitting outside across from the fountain. You will not be disappointed.

The staff is friendly and eager to help, we make a point to stop by every time we are in Newport News.

owner_response.author: Geri P, Owner at Aromas World - Specialty Coffees & Gourmet Bakery, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi, Bob....Thanks so much for taking the time to review your visit with us in Newport News!
So glad that you enjoyed it, and we look forward to seeing you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun atmosphere and great food
data.text: While visiting Colonial Williamsburg--all my wife and I wanted for lunch was a wholesome sandwich, which we got in spades at Aromas World. The atmosphere is funky and filled with students and other tourists. The sandwiches are available on hearty breads and the coffee is delicious. We liked it so much we had lunch there twice, which is atypical for us when we travel. Our next time in Williamsburg--we will return.

data.title: Worth the trip
data.text: Had breakfast and coffee here and played cards. Really nice stag and good food and coffee. Egg scramble huevos ranchero were on point.

data.title: May have picked the wrong time to visit.
data.text:
The shop wasn't full, but all the tables were being camped out at by people using the wifi.  It's  a great place for folks to loiter, but they could use the rail and leave the tables for groups that came to eat.  Despite there being no line to order, we had to wait for our order.  I had perked coffee with a shot.  The airpots were running dry, which ended up meaning I got a blend I didn't intend on. 

I've been to the Williamsburg store and enjoyed it.  I will be back to this store since anyone can have a bad day.  But my expectations will be lower.

data.title: Great coffee, very good sandwiches. Good for lunch or after show coffee.
data.text: Aroma's has become a staple in town center. I believe they started in Williamsburg's merchant square. They have always offered a variety of good coffee and Desserts. Their sandwiches and soups are tasty and well prepared and presented.

data.title: Met my wife here!
data.text: This place will always have a special place in my heart...my wife and I met here. Nice place to get good coffee and a light meal. They will have live music on occasion. The food is good, too. Parking isn't bad usually, either.

owner_response.author: Geri P, Guest Relations Manager at Aromas World - Specialty Coffees & Gourmet Bakery, responded to this review
owner_response.text: That is so sweet that you met your wife at our location! We are so happy for you both and wish you both the best! You could say that you love her a latte! Thanks so much for the wonderful review and congrats!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good cup-o-joe
data.text: Quiet place to grab a cup-o-joe.  I've only been here for afternoon pick-me-ups, and not the morning rush hour, so it might be more crowded/louder at other times.  Seems like a good place to do some work or read quietly.  When the weather is nice, they have tables outside which I enjoy.  They do offer snacks and other food but I can only attest to getting a decent cup of coffee, thus far.

owner_response.author: Geri P, Guest Relations Manager at Aromas World - Specialty Coffees & Gourmet Bakery, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks for your response! You should definitely come back and have something to eat sometime. The pastries are great but by far my favorite is the southwest chicken wrap! It's so yummy! Hope you give us a try for breakfast or lunch. We run specials daily and you can check out the specials on our Facebook page. Thanks again!
~The Aromas Family
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good food
data.text:
Visited here for breakfast. 
Busy place ---busy is good. 
Enjoyed quiche for breakfast. Healthy portions.

owner_response.author: Geri P, Guest Relations Manager at Aromas World - Specialty Coffees & Gourmet Bakery, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks for your review! I also love the quiche! They come in all different flavors so make sure you get a chance to come back and try the other ones! They are all delicious!
~The Aromas Family
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great location to eat outside
data.text: I went for dinner on a Saturday night. I wasnt looking for anything special and wanted something cheap. My friend in Oyster Point suggested this place. It's a classic coffee shop with a few things to eat. I didnt get the coffee, just food. It's at a great location in Oyster Point so we ate outside and enjoyed the sun going down. I would go again.

owner_response.author: Geri P, Guest Relations Manager at Aromas World - Specialty Coffees & Gourmet Bakery, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks for your review. Even though it is getting a little bit colder out now you could always cuddle up inside near the windows and take in the beautiful view over Oyster Point. Thanks again for reviewing and we hope to see you back again soon!
~Love the Aromas Family
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice little spot
data.text: We were here for a wedding at a neighboring hotel and this little gem had great coffee, a warm and inviting atmosphere and suprisingly good food.

owner_response.author: Geri P, Guest Relations Manager at Aromas World - Specialty Coffees & Gourmet Bakery, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your review! We love to hear from all our patrons and appreciate it!
~The Aromas Family
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best coffee shop in Newport News
data.text: If your goal is to get away from Starbucks and experience a non-chain coffee shop in Newport News, this is the place. Serves a solid breakfast as well. Enjoy!

owner_response.author: Geri P, Guest Relations Manager at Aromas World - Specialty Coffees & Gourmet Bakery, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We love to hear from our patrons and will pass it along to our staff. We hope that you come back again soon! We really appreciate your patronage and support!
~Love the Aromas Family
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Kitchen closes at 8pm
data.text: Great place, loved the gentleman playing the guitar and singing , but when we ordered a bagel for my son the kitchen was not available . So disappointed !!!! The coffee was good !!!

owner_response.author: Geri P, Guest Relations Manager at Aromas World - Specialty Coffees & Gourmet Bakery, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi, Sorry that the kitchen was closed. Because of the slow business at dinner time we had to start closing the kitchen earlier. I will have to talk to the staff there because they still have other items that could have been purchased for snacking on. We are hoping that business in the evenings will pick up so we can re-open for dinner again. So sorry. 
~The aromas family
owner_response.title: Owner Response
